Remarks: Recommended a Special Dividend of Rs. 1.65 per Ordinary Share of Re. 1/- each and a Dividend of Rs. 2.80 per Ordinary Share of Re.1/- each.
Special Centenary dividend of Re. 5.50 per Ordinary Share of Re 1/- each and a dividend of Re. 4.50 per Ordinary Share for the financial year ended March 31, 2010.
